mapper.select: SELECT comment_code, c.user_code AS user_code, u.user_nickname AS comment_nickname, comment_context, profile_regdate, user_picture FROM user_tbl u, profile_comment_tbl c WHERE u.user_code = c.writer_code AND c.user_code = (SELECT user_code FROM user_tbl WHERE user_id = #{user_id}) ORDER BY profile_regdate desc
